title: Introducing: Kye Munroe
body:
Sadly I can’t really tell you too much about Knoxville’s **Kye Munroe, **she’s a bit of a beautiful enigma (she shares a birthday with Posh Spice, I know that much).

Self-producing from her mini-bedroom studio, her songs are dark, slightly claustrophobic pop tracks, drawing from house inspirations. Recent offering, _Hide and Seek_, is a sleek, almost BANKS-esque number, but with far more kick to it. Elsewhere there’s the brooding instrumental _Limitation_ alongside a couple of collaborations (some of which have seemingly disappeared). Check out Hide and Seek and The Line below, as well as a couple more of at her [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/kyemunroe). Also keep up with her awesome [Tumblr](http://kyemunroe.tumblr.com/), where fans have likened her to everyone from Megan Fox to Jacquelyn Jablonski.
